name: Dashes - Heads Up
description:
Dashes is a classic avoidance game that is free to use to all users. This app challenges your reaction time to see how quick you are to avoid the incoming dashes.

We provide you with a little help, you can deflect the bombs into the dashes to clear a brief path but you still have to have good timing to clear the line of dashes.

This app features a character that you drag around the screen to avoid the incoming dashes. Don't get hit by the dashes or you will explode into a ton of little balls!

Have fun and challenge your friends to beat your best scores by sharing your best score on Facebook with our Facebook like button on the game over screen!

Please do not forget the most important part of our app is YOU! We truly value your feedback in order to make our app the best we possibly can! If you don't mind, take some time to review our app after you have given it a try and let us know exactly how you feel about it.

-Easy/Medium Game Play
-Game Center Connected

Support: itrapapps.com
